title: 龙珠MOD怎么防止波爆炸破坏地形呢？
author: 冷灬血
txt_content: 怎么防止啊，求龙珠MOD大神教教，还有，就是龙珠MOD怎么在服务器卖技能点，求教，新人一枚{:10_529:}

replies.author: jrant
replies.txt_content:
jinryuujrmcore.cfg配置文件里
    # Server Sided! If 'false' then Explosion Griefing is on, If 'true' then its off. (may reduce lag if true)
    B:"Explosion Griefing Off"=false
改成
    # Server Sided! If 'false' then Explosion Griefing is on, If 'true' then its off. (may reduce lag if true)
    B:"Explosion Griefing Off"=true

replies.author: 住在海边浪
replies.txt_content:
使用本款插件NeverLag 1.3.0http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... peid%26typeid%3D192
这个插件可以防止爆炸破坏地形

replies.author: 冷灬血
replies.txt_content:
住在海边浪 发表于 2016-2-6 15:05
使用本款插件NeverLag 1.3.0http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=415779&extra=page%3D1%26 ...
听人家说插件是不行的

replies.txt_content: 是可以的。

replies.author: 住在海边浪
replies.txt_content:
#爆炸不破坏方块、物品
#关闭爆炸破坏可以有效减少爆炸产生的计算力以及避免地形被破坏
AntiExplode:
  Enable: true
